name: Dops app
body:
###Welcome to DOPS.
DOPS is a web based app which can be used by the traffic policemen to deduct points from the drivers at the traffic offences.This app is based on html,css and javascript.

###concept
As the road traffic gets worse, the traffic offence occurrences also increases in an increasing rate.Because of this road accidents also increases. Our main motivation is to make the driver morecareful. The concept of our application, DOPS- Driving Offence Point System, is to grant the driver a number of merit points and deduct a corresponding number of point when he gets caught for an
offence.

###Impact
* Automated all the services of department of motor traffic.
* Driver becomes more careful because the license will be cancelled for a period of 6 months.
* Bribery rate will go down.


### Authors and Contributors
dulaj sanjaya (@dulajsan)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with DOPS? Check out our documentation or [contact support](https://github.com/dulajsan) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
